name: Last Flame (NoelOskar, ComposerAlex2405)
description:
Last Flame is a 2D Top Down Bullet Hell Shooter, in which you play as last of demon hunters, you have ability to change into a fire form, and dash to avoid bullets, will you manage to defeat the evil demon and rescue your friends?

This game was created for Weekly Game Jam - Week 149!

theme for which was "Last One Left"

Controlls:

Walk: WSAD/Arrow Keys

Dash: While moving press spacebar/shift

Shoot: Left mouse button

Change into fire form: Right Mouse Button

Credits: Noeloskar - Scripts, Art, Game Design ComposerAlex2405 - Music, Sound effects, Game Design My Youtube Channel My Discord Server
